author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3038 Return the possibility to create custom WebRequest/WebResponse per Application
There is an API change though - now it needs the HttpServletRequest as well.

author: cmchen
msg: Fix for bug introduced by last patch.
ASCII TIFF/Exif values were not correctly padded with a trailing zero.
Also suppressed an image with invalid EXIF data that was breaking the ExifRewriteText.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1862] update poms in projects to refer to the current version of their parents, to pick up the docbook change.
Also, fix spelling in osgi-runtime plugin for the value of the <name> stanza
